ExploreFact.Text: A Jovial Nomai informed me that the cake for the celebration is missing!
A Serious Baker informed me that the cake had supposedly already been delivered.
An Angry Postmaster informed me that their employee Carl had the cake.
Carl dropped the cake in the ocean!
I found the cake in a deep trench in the sea
Despite the loss of cake, the party could still continue!
A Jovial Nomai told me the baker lives atop the Blue Tower
Despite the cake being gone, the Jovial Nomai wishes to have the party anyways and asked me to invite the others!
A Serious Nomai told me the Postmaster lives on the Star Shaped Island
The Serious Nomai was not interested in joining us for the party
A Frustrated Nomai told me that Carl was last seen in the Magenta Mountains
The Frustrated Nomai will join us for the party after a short 22 minute nap
A Sad Nomai named Carl dropped the cake into the sea right off the front of the line of the Magenta Islands
Carl was very excited about being invited to the party and will be there soon!
